name: Crimson Rite
description:
----------------------------------------

Hey all,

This is our 3rd small game as a team(F.Cenk Ertan, A.Yiğit Ertan, F.Can Felah) together. Crimson Rite started as a two-day game jam project but we ended up spending around two months and shaped it into a short action-adventure game. We've tried to establish a world filled with interesting flavor bits story-wise with, in our opinion, a twisted ending.
We have created all the assets from scratch and created five music tracks.

We would like to express that we welcome and encourageall feedback.

We hope that you play and enjoy our game.

Thanks and cheers.
